text: my student is switching from Julia back to C++ :disappointed:

elements.text: my student is switching from Julia back to C++

text: Mostly personal preference, but I think they also felt edge cases like <https://github.com/JuliaLang/julia/issues/27988#issuecomment-772896802> (comment is from me, but the issue arose from my student’s code) made predicting code performance too confusing compared with C++.

elements.text: Mostly personal preference, but I think they also felt edge cases like
(comment is from me, but the issue arose from my student’s code) made predicting code performance too confusing compared with C++.

text: They jokingly said they’d prefer to have to trick the C++ compiler they know rather than the Julia compiler they don’t know.
